28/* !!ONLY FOR USE INTERNALLY TO LIBARCHIVE!! */
29
30#ifndef ARCHIVE_PLATFORM_ACL_H_INCLUDED
31#define ARCHIVE_PLATFORM_ACL_H_INCLUDED
32
33/*
34 * Determine what ACL types are supported
35 */
36#if ARCHIVE_ACL_FREEBSD || ARCHIVE_ACL_SUNOS || ARCHIVE_ACL_LIBACL
37#define ARCHIVE_ACL_POSIX1E 1
38#endif
39
40#if ARCHIVE_ACL_FREEBSD_NFS4 || ARCHIVE_ACL_SUNOS_NFS4 || \
41 ARCHIVE_ACL_DARWIN || ARCHIVE_ACL_LIBRICHACL
42#define ARCHIVE_ACL_NFS4 1
43#endif
44
45#if ARCHIVE_ACL_POSIX1E || ARCHIVE_ACL_NFS4
46#define ARCHIVE_ACL_SUPPORT 1
47#endif
48
49#endif /* ARCHIVE_PLATFORM_ACL_H_INCLUDED */
50
